converse.line: Why, hello there young lady. Are you having a great day today?

choice.line: That's a real shame, it is. Would a caramel cream make you feel better? Take one.
I am enjoying the nice weather out today. The sun feels great on my skin.
Even though you live in such a dark, gloomy town?
Yes. This way, I don't get sunburn. That's one of the reasons I chose to move here.

converse.line: Why, it's nice of you to visit an old man like me. Please, have a seat and I'll make some tea.
I'm quite alright, thank you. (My heart is impaled with a thousand needles right now.)
(Oh, no. I can't look him in the face any more. Let alone talk to him.)

choice.line: Sir, I believe I've caused you some trouble...
No, I don't think you have. Why do you say that?

My dear! What a riveting tale! They should write a book on you and your adventures. I was wondering where that gemstone went. But I see now that you had good reason to take it, so there's no way I would dislike what you chose to do.
Yes, I do and it's been missing lately.
I found these thieves talking about just robbing a gemstone from an old man. So I beat them up and got the gemstone back. I'm here to return it.

converse.line: I want to give you something for returning the gemstone to me.
It's alright. You don't have to--
I want to give something to you. I'll be dead soon, so I want to hand out objects that will keep the memory of me living on. Please take this gift.
You are always welcome here. Feel free to "chill" as the kids say.
